alert.note: Alert for Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 4:58PM EDT until July 26 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sanilac County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Argyle, or 9 miles west of Deckerville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Deckerville around 515 PM EDT. Forestville around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tyre, Decker, Palms, McGregor, Forester, Minden, Snover, Elmer, Richmondville and New Greenleaf. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
